SET NOCOUNT ON /****************************************************************/ /* 내배너그룹테이블 - T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP 조회 - SELECT QUERY */ /****************************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED DECLARE @DEVICE_CODE BIGINT = {0} SELECT A.DEVICE_CODE , A.GROUP_SEQ , A.GROUP_NAME , A.FRAME_TYPE , B.NAME AS FRAME_TYPE_NAME , A.CONTENT_TYPE , E.NAME AS CONTENT_TYPE_NAME , A.PLAY_TIME , F.NAME AS PLAY_TIME_NAME , A.REMARK , A.HIDE , A.INSERT_CODE , C.USER_NAME AS INSERT_NAME , A.INSERT_DATE , A.UPDATE_CODE , D.USER_NAME AS UPDATE_NAME , A.UPDATE_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_DEVICE_MAIN WHERE DEVICE_CODE = A.DEVICE_CODE AND GROUP_SEQ = A.GROUP_SEQ) AS MAIN_CNT FROM T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP A INNER JOIN T_COMMON B ON B.MAIN_CODE = 'H002' AND B.SUB_CODE = A.FRAME_TYPE INNER JOIN T_MEMBER C ON A.INSERT_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE INNER JOIN T_MEMBER D ON A.UPDATE_CODE = D.MEMBER_CODE INNER JOIN T_COMMON E ON E.MAIN_CODE = 'A010' AND E.SUB_CODE = A.CONTENT_TYPE INNER JOIN T_COMMON F ON F.MAIN_CODE = 'U006' AND F.SUB_CODE = A.PLAY_TIME
WHERE A.DEVICE_CODE = @DEVICE_CODE #[GROUP_SEQ] #[HIDE] ORDER BY A.GROUP_SEQ
SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /**************************************************************/ /* 내배너그룹테이블 - T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP 저장 - SAVE QUERY */ /**************************************************************/ DECLARE @DEVICE_CODE BIGINT = N'{0}' , @GROUP_SEQ INT = N'{1}' , @GROUP_NAME NVARCHAR(100) = N'{2}' , @FRAME_TYPE INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{3}') = 1 THEN '{3}' ELSE NULL END ) , @CONTENT_TYPE INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{4}') = 1 THEN '{4}' ELSE NULL END ) , @PLAY_TIME INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{5}') = 1 THEN '{5}' ELSE NULL END ) , @REMARK NVARCHAR(200) = N'{6}' , @HIDE BIT = CONVERT(BIT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{7}') = 1 THEN '{7}' ELSE NULL END ) , @INSERT_CODE INT = {8} , @INSERT_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE() , @UPDATE_CODE INT = {8} , @UPDATE_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
SELECT @FRAME_TYPE = CASE WHEN DEVICE_TYPE IN (1,2) THEN 12 ELSE 1 END FROM T_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_CODE = @DEVICE_CODE UPDATE A SET GROUP_NAME = @GROUP_NAME , FRAME_TYPE = @FRAME_TYPE , CONTENT_TYPE = @CONTENT_TYPE , PLAY_TIME = @PLAY_TIME , REMARK = @REMARK , HIDE = @HIDE , UPDATE_CODE = @UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE = @UPDATE_DATE
FROM T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP A WHERE DEVICE_CODE= @DEVICE_CODE AND GROUP_SEQ= @GROUP_SEQ IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP ( DEVICE_CODE , GROUP_SEQ , GROUP_NAME , FRAME_TYPE , CONTENT_TYPE , PLAY_TIME , REMARK , HIDE , INSERT_CODE , INSERT_DATE , UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE
) SELECT @DEVICE_CODE , @GROUP_SEQ , @GROUP_NAME , @FRAME_TYPE , @CONTENT_TYPE , @PLAY_TIME , @REMARK , @HIDE , @INSERT_CODE , @INSERT_DATE , @UPDATE_CODE , @UPDATE_DATE
END SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /*************************************************************/ /* 내배너그룹테이블 - T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP 삭제 - DeviceMainDelete */ /*************************************************************/ DECLARE @DEVICE_CODE BIGINT = N'{0}' , @GROUP_SEQ INT = N'{1}' , @UPDATE_CODE INT = CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{2}') = 1 THEN '{2}' ELSE 0 END
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM T_DEVICE_MAIN WHERE DEVICE_CODE= @DEVICE_CODE AND GROUP_SEQ= @GROUP_SEQ ) BEGIN UPDATE T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP SET HIDE = 1 ,UPDATE_CODE = @UPDATE_CODE ,UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE DEVICE_CODE= @DEVICE_CODE AND GROUP_SEQ= @GROUP_SEQ END ELSE BEGIN DELETE T_DEVICE_MAIN_GROUP
WHERE DEVICE_CODE= @DEVICE_CODE AND GROUP_SEQ= @GROUP_SEQ
END
